titleStmt.title: Nu springer Vaaren fra sin Seng

work.title: Nu springer Vaaren fra sin Seng
Now, spring is leaping out of bed
Nu springer våren fra sin seng

history.p: According to his diary, Nielsen composed the melody on 30 December 1914. It might originally have been intended for the first volume of En Snes danske Viser (1915, CNW Coll. 9). For some unknown reason, the melody was only later included in the second volume of 1917 (CNW Coll. 11 ).

incipText.p: Nu springer Vaaren fra sin Seng
Now, spring is leaping out of bed
Nu springer våren fra sin seng
Now, spring is leaping out of bed
